Headline: Red Line Service Resuming Normal Routing
ShortDescription: Red Line service is resuming its normal routing, via the subway, btwn Fullerton & Cermak-Chinatown after an earlier reroute.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service is resuming its normal routing, via the subway, between Fullerton & Cermak-Chinatown.

Trains were temporarily rerouted via the elevated lines due to an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near Clark/Division.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute at Chicago/Central
ShortDescription: 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Augusta, Washington & Central, due to street blockage near Chicago/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Augusta, Washington then resume their normal route on Central, due to street blockage near Chicago/Central.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #57 Laramie Temporary Reroute at Chicago/Central
ShortDescription: 57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Augusta, Washington & Laramie, due to street blockage near Chicago/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Augusta, Washington & Laramie, due to street blockage near Chicago/Central.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier delay in the subway. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier delay in the subway. 

 Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
